code: export async function getAllUsers(){const url="".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_SERVER_URL,"/api/user/all");const request={credentials:"include"};const response=await fetch(url,request);return await response.json();}export async function getUser(userId){const url="".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_SERVER_URL,"/api/user/").concat(userId);const request={credentials:"include"};const response=await fetch(url,request);return await response.json();}export async function postUser(user){const url="".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_SERVER_URL,"/api/user");const request={method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},credentials:"include",body:JSON.stringify({...user})};const response=await fetch(url,request);return await response.json();}export async function putUser(user){const url="".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_SERVER_URL,"/api/user/").concat(user.id);const request={method:"PUT",headers:{"Content Type":"application/json"},credentials:"include",body:JSON.stringify({...user})};const response=await fetch(url,request);return await response.json();}export async function deleteUser(userId){const url="".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_SERVER_URL,"/api/user/").concat(userId);const request={method:"DELETE",headers:{"Content Type":"application/json"},credentials:"include"};await fetch(url,request);}
